puzzle.hint: Every soul has one appointed, and nations too.
puzzle.arabicVerse: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُم مِّن طِينٍۢ ثُمَّ قَضَىٰٓ أَجَلًۭا ۖ وَأَجَلٌۭ مُّسَمًّى عِندَهُۥ ۖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمْ تَمْتَرُونَ
puzzle.verse: 6:2 — It is He who created you from clay and then decreed a term and a specified time [known] to Him; then [still] you are in dispute.
